transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: [Unintelligible].
Executive: Good morning sir, speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Madam, this, you, number is different. If I am satisfied and put it, do I have to put permanent again?
Executive: No sir, if you are satisfied, if you are moving something, then you can give me feedback. You can give me only which exchange you want to do from this.
Customer: Which one do you want me to give? I have given satisfied. Which one do you want me to give?
Executive: If any page is open, sir, after giving satisfied.
Customer: Nothing is opening.
Executive: Just give satisfied sir. Is it getting clicked for you?
Customer: Yes. Yes, in that your feedback option for service request number has been already submitted.
Executive: It has been submitted sir. Actually, I think you have already given it. I think you have just given satisfied.
Customer: Yes, it came and it asked satisfied in that. I thought I will give it again.
Executive: Actually, it is closed sir.
Customer: Okay okay madam okay. In that, will I have to comment something in that when giving?
Executive: It will be showing sir. One minute sir.
Customer: Okay, okay. Okay, I will see next time. Okay madam okay. If you want to contact, directly call on my number sir.
Customer: Ah, okay okay okay. Which number to call?
Executive: Sir, message me. You were already talking, right? You were already talking on this number only, right?
Customer: Ah, look at sir, actually number, just look at that.
Executive: Ah, okay. Okay okay madam okay madam okay.
Executive: Okay okay thank you so much.
Customer: Okay okay okay madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked about submitting permanent feedback again.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified feedback already submitted.

- Executive provided her direct contact number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, contact number, satisfaction
